alert.note: Alert for Glasscock; Midland (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 6:32PM CDT until June 02 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Glasscock County in western Texas... Northern Midland County in western Texas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 631 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Midland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Multiple off-duty NWS meteorologists report quarter sized hail across northern Midland. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Midland, Greenwood, Midland Airpark and Spraberry. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 134 and 146. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for western Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for western Texas.
